captions.text:
- Come on, let's go, I don't
want to miss the previews.

- Well, I can't leave without
my phone, will you call it?

Weird Things Couples Do
When They Lose Their Phone
- It just went to voice mail.

- Okay, I woke up, my phone
was charging, I grabbed it.
- Yeah, it helps me wake up.

and then while I was taking
a shower and getting ready,
I was listening to a podcast on my phone.

I remember because I
remember fast-forwarding

- So I came into the
kitchen, I fed the fish.

I took a picture of Emmett
eating his breakfast.
I didn't put it in the refrigerator.
- Well, that's where it was last time.
- One time I do that and now you think

I just leave my phone in the
refrigerator all the time?
- Well, then I don't know where it is.
- Well was it in the fridge?
- So I sat here and I texted my mom.
- That's the last thing I remember.

- Well, then it must be
here somewhere, so...
- We could just get you another phone.
My whole life was on that phone.
- Those pictures were on that phone.
- Well, did you at least back it up?
- I don't even know how to do that.

- Okay, walk me through
these specific steps
on how to back up your phone.
- We could just use my phone.

My phone can't just
disappear into thin air!
- Well I don't know where it is, okay?
- Are you sure you don't have it?
You're not just messing with me?
- Why would I have your phone?
I have my phone and my wallet.
- Okay, there's an explanation for this.
I am going to murder you right now.

title: Weird Things Couples Do When They Lose Their Phone

comments.text:
"I didn't put it in the refrigerator."
"Well, that's where it was last time."
"One time, one time I do that and now you think I just leave my phone in 
the refrigerator all the time?"
"Well, then I don't know where it is."
"Well, was it in the fridge...?"
"No."﻿

how to find your iphone that still has battery:
1) navigate to icloud on your computer, sign in
2) use find my iphone to send a sound to your phone regardless of volume or 
setting
3) find your phone﻿
